we are about to cross India...
But, well, I am a little worried.
My image of India is a place where people
only eat curry and you could fall ill at any time.
I am worried that my body may not be able to handle the culture gap.
It is a nice country, where simple people live.
Let me carry that for you!
It will not hurt your stomach.
I will show you a hotel!
In the 20th century, its population is 11 million.
An immense energy swirls about the city!
I stepped in some cow shit!
If you do not give me a tip, you will not go to heaven, Mister.
Do not put your nose on it!
Is not it a great country?
This is what makes this country so wonderful!
Episode 10: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 1
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
A sweet drink made by boiling black tea, sugar, and ginger with milk.
It is just a matter of getting used to it.
Once you get used to it, you will see how wonderful this country is.
I will like it once I get used to it, huh?
Well, they say that people adapt to their surroundings.
I will leave it to you.
It had better be something amazing.
Gorgeous, splendid food that suits a Frenchman like me.
Which means we can pick anything.
Let us see, something he will like...
The toilet's shaped oddly, but it is pretty clean.
A nice guy like myself cannot stand it when bathrooms are dirty.
There is a pig sticking its head out of the toilet!
This toilet is unusual, even in India.
They accidentally made the pig pen down below a little too high.
So when the pig gets hungry, it sticks its head out.
Th-That is not what I am aski
That means this pig's food is...
That is why it is there?!
That is why you use this.
Now you can go while the pig's recoiling from the blow to the head.
Our manager actually gets the pig to lick his butt and always says
how great it is, because he gets so clean.
I do not think I could ever get used to this...
I will wait until we get to the hotel.
I could have sworn I saw something weird there.
I guess I cannot help it.
I mean, there was a pig in the toilet.
It is not surprising I would see an illusion of a monster outside the window.
So this is what they mean by culture shock in India.
I can only see it in the mirror!
So this is the mirror Stand that Jotaro heard about.
The man with two right hands...
If that was the Stand, that means...
That means he is finally here!
Jotaro, the Stand user you heard about that uses mirrors is here!
The bastard that killed my little sister!
The bastard that stepped all over my sister's life, soul, and pride.
The one you seek vengeance upon is here?
Mr. Joestar, I will be traveling on my own here.
Now that I know the guy who killed my sister is nearby,
I am not going to wait for him to come after me.
I would be at a disadvantage if I let him attack me,
and it is not my style.
I will find him first, and kill him!
Even though you do not know what he looks like, or what his Stand is?
Knowing that he has two right hands is plenty!
And he knows that I am after him, as well.
He should be worried that I will come for his head in his sleep.
You will go out for wool, only to come home shorn.
What is that supposed to mean?
Are you implying that I am going to lose?
Cannot you see that the enemy purposely attacked to get you alone?
I will not allow you to travel alone, Polnareff.
I am going to make this clear.
I told you in Hong Kong that I was only traveling with you
so I could get my revenge.
Mr. Joestar and Jotaro should already know this.
I have been alone from the start!
I have always been fighting alone!
Did you forget that you were brainwashed by Dio?
Have you forgotten that this all leads back to Dio?
Like you would ever understand how I feel after having my sister killed!
I heard that the last time you met Dio, you got scared and ran away.
A coward like you would never understand how I feel!
You were just lucky that you beat me in Hong Kong.
Oh, did that piss you off?
But do not forget that I am a lot more pissed off than you are right now!
You can just keep acting like the mature one as always, Avdol.
Now that he is like this, no one can stop him.
No, I am just disappointed in him.
I did not think he was that sort of man.
I did indeed run in fear.
That is also why I believe we will win,
and can say with certainty that you will lose.
Then I will say this with certainty, too.
I am here to see a friend.
I will dedicate my life to you.
Just tell me whatever you wish of me.
So please, let me stay by your side forever.
I am old enough to marry.
I live each day like it is my last, and one day, it will be my last.
Royalty like yourself cannot think about marrying me.
No matter how much we love each other.
You are the only one I love in the whole world.
It is because I love you that I cannot marry you.
It is hard for me, too.
My chest feels like it could burst.
But I will come see you once in a while and hold you like this.
That is enough to make me happy.
It is not nice to eavesdrop.
I am sure you would like to say I am being as indirect as ever,
and that there are girls like her everywhere...
But she is an easy mark, and it is convenient.
She would do anything for me, even throw away her own life.
You know how I work, do not you?
By the way, about Silver Chariot's Polnareff.
Seems he is looking for you on his own.
He fell hook, line, and sinker for your plan to lure him out.
With you and your Hanged Man, and me, Hol Horse, with my Emperor,
So he did not come back after all.
You are sure you saw a man with two right hands?
He was just right there, too.
He was with that man right there.
The gun is mightier than the sword.
Man, talk about a memorable quote.
I am the user of the Stand that suggests the Emperor card.
Lord Dio paid me to get rid of you guys.
I do not need the self-introduction.
Do you know the man with two right hands?
I, Hol Horse, will be taking care of you.
Trash like you always says that,
and it always ends up the other way around.
Lord Dio said that Polnareff was a man who underestimated others,
and that I would have no problem beating him.
He was exactly right, so I could not help but laugh.
If I cannot see him until I defeat you, then that is just what I will do.
The tank is stronger than the soldier, and tanks are weak against mines.
See, it is pretty much the basics of battle.
My Emperor is stronger than you,
so I thought I would let you know about my Stand's abilities before we fight.
The gun is mightier than the sword.
What are you trying to say?
A sword cannot beat a weapon that shoots.
If it takes off its armor...
It is nothing but a bullet!
The bullet is also my Stand.
Underestimating me by not even considering that
I went looking for you because I was worried, and look what I find!
You are too full of yourself, Polnareff.
Are you going to lecture me again?
The enemy knows everything about you!
You said you have lived life alone,
but from now on, you will not be able to win alone!
What bad timing for an outsider to interfere.
I will burn it to cinders!
Hey, there is a weird fight going on over there.
Man, today must be my day.
My gun and Centerfold's mirror do not do very well with Avdol's flames,
so we thought he would be our most formidable enemy.
There are no scary pieces left in this game of Stratego.
It is just a minor wound.
He is going to start speaking...
He will open his eyes at any moment.
You are going to wake up, right?
That is what he gets for lecturing people.
Mr. Avdol was worried about you
He likes to meddle in other people's business,
but he is slow as hell, so they got him.
Guys like him just get in the way...
That is why I said I would do this myself.
Having people up and die on me...
It just annoys me so much!
He is got a bold face, and yet he died so easily.
Come to think of it, she was really good at sobbing...
Are you telling me to hold back?
Do not fall for the enemy's provocation!
Mr. Avdol told you not to fight by yourself!
